nodes.text: Parsel was a Weequay male pirate in the Ohnaka Gang during the Clone Wars.
Around 20 BBY, Parsel piloted Hondo Ohnaka's ship on his way to attack a group of Jedi Initiates and steal their lightsaber crystals.

Parsel later informed Jiro that a ship's communication system was silenced, but working, and that there were life forms aboard the ship. After that, when it turned out that Darth Maul and his brother Savage Opress were on the ship, this pirate along with Jiro and some of the other pirates joined them against Hondo Ohnaka. Later on, when the two Sith were overpowered by Obi-Wan Kenobi and Hondo, the remaining pirates joined Hondo again, and helped him to chase the brothers away from Florrum.
